pr_title: Adding the providerUrl to the issue property

timeline.message: Feat: Adding the providerUrl to the issue property and the searching by issue property

timeline.bodyText: Can we make this its own function?
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: We should make sure that the URL is actually being set during processing.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Refactor: Moving the URL formatting into a separate method.

timeline.bodyText: This can now be a method reference. this::formatUrl
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Refactor: updating to use method reference.

timeline.bodyText: When merging this you will need to update the isuetracker-jira library to include the provider URL as well since this is now an issue property.  The class will be the JiraIssueSearchProperties class. Also will this need to be added to the Jira Plugin that includes the feature to migrate issues.  Add the Black Duck Server URL as the provider URL in the Jira Plugin migration issue.
timeline.author: psantos1113
